SELECT userNo , userID , userName , type , profileImageURL , birthday , facebookID , facebookURL , kakaoID , jobTitle , sex from user where userID in ( SELECT friend_one from friends where friend_two=#{value} and status = 1 union SELECT friend_two from friends where friend_one=#{value} and status = 1 ) and isDeleted is null limit 0, 3;
